text:
Platform: PC-x86 NT4.0 WKS Sp6a EN
JDK: IBM JDK 1.2.2 (as shipped with IVJ 3.5.3 Enterpise Edition)
IDE: Visual Age for Java 3.5.3 Enterprise Edition

Description:
Importing Xerces 1.4.0 source distribution into the repository shows the 
following errors (deprecated warnings ignored):
---
	org.apache.xerces.utils.regex  5 Errors, 0 Warnings
		Op  4 Errors, 0 Warnings
			Superclass creates a cycle in the class hierarchy: 
Op$ChildOp

			org.apache.xerces.utils.regex.Op$ChildOp createClosure
(int)  1 Errors, 0 Warnings
				Type mismatch: cannot convert from 
org.apache.xerces.utils.regex.Op$ModifierOp to 
org.apache.xerces.utils.regex.Op$ChildOp
			org.apache.xerces.utils.regex.Op$ModifierOp 
createModifier(org.apache.xerces.utils.regex.Op, 
org.apache.xerces.utils.regex.Op, int, int)  2 Errors, 0 Warnings
				The method setChild invoked for type 
org.apache.xerces.utils.regex.Op$ModifierOp with arguments 
(org.apache.xerces.utils.regex.Op) is not defined
				The field named next for type named 
org.apache.xerces.utils.regex.Op$ModifierOp is not defined
		RegularExpression  1 Errors, 0 Warnings
			org.apache.xerces.utils.regex.Op compile
(org.apache.xerces.utils.regex.Token, org.apache.xerces.utils.regex.Op, 
boolean)  1 Errors, 0 Warnings
				Type mismatch: cannot convert from 
org.apache.xerces.utils.regex.Op$ModifierOp to org.apache.xerces.utils.regex.Op
---
I would like to clean up the repository from intermixed versions of different
creator: n.schmitt@scaet.de
